meanings.definition: Not related to or involving clinical medical treatment.
meanings.sent1: The research focused on nonclinical aspects of healthcare.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had both clinical and nonclinical departments.
meanings.sent3: The nonclinical approach to wellness emphasized natural remedies.
meanings.sent4: Her nonclinical view of medicine was refreshing in a world of prescriptions.
meanings.sent5: The nonclinical environment of the spa was calming and peaceful.

meanings.definition: Not pertaining to or characteristic of a clinical setting.
meanings.sent1: The nonclinical office space was designed for creativity and collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory had separate areas for clinical and nonclinical research.
meanings.sent3: His nonclinical attire stood out among the white coats of the hospital staff.
meanings.sent4: The artist found inspiration in the nonclinical atmosphere of the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The nonclinical nature of the park made it a perfect escape from the city.
